labels.invalidEmailAddress: Entered e-mail address is not valid.

alerts.passwordResetSuccessful: New password was sent to the entered e-mail address if there is an account associated with it.
alerts.serverError: There was an error on the server.
alerts.fileDeletionQuestion: Are you sure that you want to delete this file?
alerts.loginFailed: Entered credentials do not exist or this user account is not active.
alerts.unauthorized: You do not have permissions to do that.

texts.forgottenPasswordExplanation: You can enter your e-mail address and ask for a new password.
